name: PromptLoop
headline: AI for market research and analysis
description:
PromptLoop helps GTM teams automate account research and data enrichment at scale. We turn manual web scraping and qualification workflows into automated processes, enabling teams to enrich thousands of accounts with detailed company data and buying intent markers in minutes.

Why PromptLoop? Sales and marketing teams traditionally spend hours manually researching accounts or rely on outdated data providers. We automatically crawl and extract precise data points from company websites, social profiles, and public sources at 10% the cost of manual research, with built-in quality controls and strict sourcing. Teams can process 10k+ accounts simultaneously, turning raw URLs into actionable qualification data tailored to your goals.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:sales; industry:market-research; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Peter Mangan, Founder
founders.description: Building PromptLoop to make it 10x easier to pull insights from the internet and research companies. Previously, I worked at an organization reducing systemic cyber risk, as a quantitative analyst for a family office and as a consultant. I enjoy history, reading and being outside kiteboarding, painting, or just enjoying a sunny run around town.

founders.name: Andrew Mangan, Co-Founder
founders.description: Andrew loves history, math, and solving hard problems. He suffered a spinal cord injury in high school and after recovering from paralysis, is even more excited about living every day to the fullest.

# Scrape 10x more website data in 10% of the time.
PromptLoop lets your run AI automation tasks on lists of data with a simple file upload. Crawl company websites, categorize entities, and run research tasks at 10% the cost of the cheapest alternatives. Guaranteed.
Get Started
Onboarding takes less than 1 hour
![speech](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fprompt.029d8d30.png&w=1080&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)
Ta|
![before](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbefore.98d088b6.jpg&w=1200&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)
![after](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fafter.9bc16274.jpg&w=1200&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)
## Trusted by dozens of fast growing teams
![Kinside](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FKinside.da2e3d14.png&w=640&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)![Arketa](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Farketa.13bace6d.png&w=1080&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)![Boon](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fboon.c4ddc2bd.jpeg&w=640&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)![Superset](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fply.dd252752.png&w=640&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)![Arch](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Farch.31204581.jpeg&w=640&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)![PhysicianX](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FphysicianX.155ea57f.jpg&w=1920&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)![Retailsphere](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fretailsphere.efc6ee89.png&w=640&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)![Trellus](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftrellus.d7f6a0e2.jpeg&w=640&q=75&dpl=dpl_5GvyG5yP9HnTm7UeaySe8QXhNt6K)
## Build the dataset you need
Pull data from thousands of websites in minutes
![ Market leading accuracy](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.promptloop.com%2Fdataset_bento.jpg&w=2048&q=75)
### Performance
Market leading accuracy
PromptLoop runs dozens of AI models to provide the most accurate results for your data needs. If you don't trust AI research give us a try and see how we can help.
![ Set up and Run in Minutes](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.promptloop.com%2Ftask_list.jpg&w=2048&q=75)
### Speed
Set up and Run in Minutes
PromptLoop comes pre built with templates to pull live data from any website on the internet. Teams usually get started in minutes and perfect formatting allows you to get exactly what you need.
![Get the data you need](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.promptloop.com%2FCleanShot%25202025-01-22%2520at%252020.49.16%25402x.jpg&w=2048&q=75)
### Search
Hard to find Data
Pull exactly what you need every time no matter the format.
![ Connect your favorite tools](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.promptloop.com%2Fintegrations.jpg&w=2048&q=75)
### Integrations
Connect your favorite tools
Full data export on unlimited rows in all plans and one click sync with Hubspot.
![Connect your favorite tools](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.promptloop.com%2Fglobe.jpg&w=2048&q=75)
### Cloud Scale
Global Infrastructure
We run thousands of browsers and AI agents for you so you can reach any website at scale from day one.
![](https://www.promptloop.com/_next/static/media/background-features.5f7a9ac9.jpg)
## 
How PromptLoop AI Works
Our custom AI models and pipelines deliver fast and reliable performance that you can depend on. Model outputs that you can trust, powering customer critical workflows.
### 1. Use a simple editor to define what outputs you want as an AI Task
Start creating custom AI tasks to give you exactly what you are looking for. Differentiate from your competitors and edit and share tasks that improve with use. Your organization has exclusive access to tasks that are built from scratch every time, with a simple email style prompt.
### 2. Upload data and run you task on each row
PromptLoop lets you run AI workflows like finding bespoke data from websites and adding custom categories to datasets with a platform you can use in Excel, Google Sheets, or by uploading a CSV on our web app.
### 3. Create new datasets and save repeatable actions
Seamlessly integrate existing PromptLoop models with text generation, summarization, web search, and custom endpoints to enhance your current workflow. Experience unprecedented efficiency and flexibility as you customize our models to adapt to your work processes.
Start creating custom AI tasks to give you exactly what you are looking for. Differentiate from your competitors and edit and share tasks that improve with use. Your organization has exclusive access to tasks that are built from scratch every time, with a simple email style prompt.

## Enterprise-Grade Research
AI Research at Scale
PromptLoop transforms how teams handle large-scale research tasks. Process thousands of URLs simultaneously, get verified sources, and maintain consistent data formats - all while saving 85% of your research time.
PromptLoop| Claude| ChatGPT| Perplexity  
---|---|---|---  
10k+ Rows at once  
Multi Page Crawling  
Strict sourcing and formatting  
Version Control  
## PromptLoop provides additional output for your team with near zero adoption time.
PromptLoop is a user-friendly AI tool for Excel and Google Sheets that helps you efficiently categorize, generate, and research data.
Zero Setup
Customized AI use cases
Deploy powerful AI workflows directly in your spreadsheets without any technical setup.
85%+ Cost saved
Cost saved by current customers on existing workflows
Free up your teams to take on more work, clients, and higher value tasks.
10x Faster
Faster that chatGPT / Claude / Scraping without compromise
Text analysis and web browsing with AI. Run thousands of queries in seconds. No waiting around. Limit the data you send to chat providers.
## Frequently asked questions
Have a different question and canâ€™t find the answer youâ€™re looking for? Reach out to our support team by [getting in touch](https://www.promptloop.com/</demo>) and weâ€™ll get back to you as soon as we can.
What can I do with PromptLoop?
    PromptLoop helps sales and GTM teams research and qualify prospects 10x faster. Our AI platform automatically extracts company data, buying signals, and custom insights from websites to help you identify and prioritize your best opportunities.
What AI models does Promptloop use?
    Promptloop use AI models to complete customer tasks in as efficient and accurate a way as possible. We automatically route each task to one of a dozen models, including from OpenAI, Anthropic, and Meta. We have custom trained models that enable us to reduce the cost to customer by 100x with higher accuracy than they might have with using a large out of the box model provider.
How much does it cost?
    You can explore Promptloop without a credit card with free daily use within limits to explore the functions. We have plans for individuals, small businesses, and enterprise to fit every time and customer.
Can I use custom AI models with PromptLoop?
    Yes - Enterprise plans include custom AI models trained on your specific data and success criteria. This allows you to automate specialized research tasks unique to your industry and GTM motion.
We are building out own internal system - can PromptLoop Integrate?
    Yes - PromptLoop integrates with major CRMs like Salesforce and HubSpot via API. Our customers use these integrations to automatically enrich and update prospect data, saving hours of manual research per day.
Can I try it free or get a demo?
    Yes, get in touch with the team and we will share access and prebuilt solutions to try and validate with your own use cases and data.
## Try PromptLoop todaySee how using AI can accelerate your researchin minutes

generated_description:
**Company Overview: PromptLoop**

PromptLoop is a cutting-edge startup founded in 2022 and based in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco. As a participant in Y Combinator's Batch W22, it is on a mission to revolutionize market research and analysis through intelligent automation. The core idea? To harness the power of AI to transform time-consuming manual tasks into efficient, automated workflows.

**What Does PromptLoop Do?**

Sales and marketing teams are often bogged down by the need to manually research prospects and analyze dataâ€”a process that can drain hours and yield outdated information. PromptLoop offers a solution by automating account research and data enrichment at scale. With its platform, users can effortlessly scrape and organize data from websites, social profiles, and other public sources, outputting precise company data and buying intent markers at a fraction of the costâ€”10% to be exactâ€”of traditional manual methods.

Imagine being able to enrich thousands of accounts with accurate data in mere minutes, while simultaneously watching costs drop dramatically. PromptLoop allows teams to process over 10,000 accounts simultaneously, turning raw URLs into actionable insights tailored to meeting specific business goals. 

**Key Features and Benefits:**

- **Automated Research:** Say goodbye to hours spent sifting through information. With built-in quality controls and strict data sourcing, you get reliable results every time.
- **AI-Powered Insights:** Leverage multiple AI models designed to deliver the most relevant insights. This means better targeting and a higher success rate in your outreach efforts.
- **Fast Implementation:** Onboarding can typically be completed in under an hour, getting your team up to speed quickly.
- **User-Friendly Interface:** PromptLoop integrates seamlessly with tools like Excel and Google Sheets, enabling users to interact with their data in familiar environments.

**Who Uses PromptLoop?**

The platform is gaining traction among various fast-growing teams and organizations looking to scale their marketing and sales efforts. It facilitates efficient data management, which is increasingly critical in today's fast-paced business landscape. 

Multiple testimonials underscore this sentiment, with users praising how PromptLoop has transformed their approach to data-driven marketing.

**The Team Behind PromptLoop**

Currently, PromptLoop comprises a small but agile team of two, operating under the guidance of Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne. Their nimble setup positions them to innovate quickly and respond to market needs effectively.

**In Conclusion**

PromptLoop is not just another SaaS tool; it's a comprehensive solution designed for the modern sales and marketing landscape, ensuring teams can access and utilize insights at an unprecedented pace and accuracy. If you're buried in account research, it might be time to check out PromptLoop. With its promise of efficiency and cost-effectiveness, it could very well be the game-changer your organization needs. 

For more information, visit [PromptLoop's website](https://www.promptloop.com/).
